channel.title: [REQ] Simple RSC PowerMiner
channel.description:
Well, basically, I need/would like a basic PowerMiner that works in the Mining Guild of RS1. It doesn't require anything fancy, just a simple move and click which clicks on the multiple colours assigned to it, such as coal with the colours of 2368548, 855309, and 2368548 for example.
I'm quite sure that there's no need for any actual testing or anything, so this shouldn't take long for someone to make. I'd attempt to do so myself, but I'm too damn lazy to actually start learning how to script in SCAR. :P
Thanks in advance to anyone who feels like killing some spare time to help a lazy bastard out...
~Xeo ;)
